import React from 'react'; import styles from './Friends.module.css' import avatar from '../../assets/img/ava.jpg' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import Paginator from '../common/Paginator/Paginator'; const User = ({ user, followThunk, unFollowThunk, followingInProgress }) => { return
{user.followed ? : }
{user.name}
u.location.country
u.location.city
} export default User;
